name: Poké Blower +
effect: You may play 2 Poké Blower + at the same time. If you play 1 Poké Blower +, flip a coin. If heads, put 1 damage counter on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. If you play 2 Poké Blower +, choose 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon and switch it with 1 of your opponent’s Active Pokémon.
author: Ryo Ueda
